page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT-PERFORMING ART
page.content: BETCHWORTH HAS AMATEUR OPERATIC AND DRAMA SOCIETY ,FOUNDED IN 1936, IT PERFORMS TWO OR THREE TIMES A YEAR. {THE AREA DEPENDS ON THE NEARBY TOWNS {AND CITIES FOR ALL THEATRE,OPERA,MUSIC {DANCING AND CINEMA. ALL "POPULAR" ENTERTAINMENT IS ALSO AVAILABLE "NEARBY". {SEE AMENITY COUNT TO CONFIRM ABSENCE {OF THIS TYPE OF ENTERTAINMENT AND OUR {NOTE ON HOW ESSENTIAL GOOD PERSONAL {MOBILITY IS IN THIS AREA FOR ALL,THIS {IN ONE CASE WE KNOW OF MEANS A PRIVATE {HELECOPTER. WE HAVE HEARD THAT ON "THE VILLAGE GREEN" AT{DAWES GREEN}THERE USED TO BE BARE FIST BOXING.{MORRIS DANCING LEIGH {THERE IS MUCH TO DO IN THE COUNTRY {DURING THE DAY ,SEE OTHER PAGES FOR {POSSIBLE EVENING ACTIVITY MAKING {ALLOWANCE FOR SEASONS AND FOR THE FACT {THERE IS GOOD EVENING MEDIA COVERAGE.
